allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Mouse Guide - Crosshair utility for macOS

A macOS utility that displays customizable crosshairs across all monitors to help track the mouse cursor and assist with reading on screen.

Features:
- Multiple crosshair orientations (horizontal, vertical, both, edge pointers, circle, reading line)
- Customizable colors, thickness, and opacity
- Automatic color adaptation based on background
- Multi-monitor support
- Keyboard shortcut toggle (Shift+Ctrl+L)
- License management with Gumroad integration
- Danish and English localization

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
